title: mod崩溃
author: canglongbeta
txt_content:
本帖最后由 梓 于 2020-5-30 22:05 编辑 

1.12.2一用拔刀剑就崩
崩溃日志：---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't be sad, have a hug! <3

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
在config文件夹里找到forge.cfg
把removeErroringEntities=false
removeErroringTileEntities=false
都改为true
开启自动清理错误实体功能

bilibiliworld v1.0.5.jar这个模组的生物导致的崩溃
